post.text:
Join us LIVE at 6:30pmE! Our nightly campaign coverage from Trump Tower!

This is a HISTORIC movement. Together, we will once again make a government by, for, and of the people! Help us close out the final weeks of this campaign strong and WIN.
Contribute $10 Now >> www.DonaldJTrump.com/Live

comment.author: Clara
comment.text: Unbelievable the Clinton's continue to get away with all the crime they have committed and continue to commit. Why aren't they being arrested?

replies.author: Haley
replies.text: Change your FB Profile Picture to a Trump Theme! Show our Strong Support.

replies.author: Haley
replies.text: Stop the Voting Dead: Contact your local Registrar of Voters office. A Notification from a family member, including the name, address & date of death of the deceased is all that is necessary is the way I understand it.
